name: Shannon Cooke
text: Peter and Kylee did an awesome job on our boundary fencing and pool fencing! They went out of there way to help us and we were extremely happy with the end product. Will be recommending to everyone.

name: Beau Norman
text: Very friendly team and know how to get the job done using quality materials. My fence was completed last week and looks brilliant. Very satisfied and can highly recommend. Thanks again guys!

name: George Walker
text: Excellent tradesman, prompt service, and great communication. I highly recommend.

name: Lisa Keogh
text: We requested a quote. this business was prompt with thier reply. A convenient time was set up. They turned up on time and were very prompt getting the quote back to us.

name: Kerry Dalgleish
text: Very professional and very approachable. Listed to what I wanted and made very constructive suggestions. Promptly met me on site and quote arrived a few days later. Good communicator.
